Click the button next to the search bar, search for and pin your favorite streamers.



Pinned streamers will appear here for quick access.

manage-dialog.title: Manager

events-dialog.description: Stay updated on upcoming QSMP events.

settings-dialog.title: Settings

headers.label: Stream Menus
headers.use-handle-as-header: Keep menu always visible above stream.

faq-dialog.title: FAQ
faq-dialog.description: Find answers to some questions you may have.

twitch-account.title: Can I use my Twitch account?
twitch-account.content:
Yes, there are 3 ways to do it: 
- Connect your account through the [Twitch website](http://twitch.tv) and then refresh the MultiQSMP page. 
- Send a message in any MultiQSMP chat and a login prompt will appear. 
- In any stream, click follow and the login prompt will also appear.

enable-chat.title: How do I enable chat?
enable-chat.content: At the top of each stream, there's a small arrow, clicking on it will open a menu with various options, including a button to toggle the chat of that stream.

streamers-status.title: What do the variations on the streamers mean?
streamers-status.content:
When the streamer is gray, it means they are offline. When there's a yellow indicator, they are online but may not be playing QSMP at the moment. 

 **Note:** To indicate whether the streamer is playing QSMP or not, tags and the game marked in the stream are taken into account, so the indicator may not always be correct.

found-bug.title: I found/am having a bug!
found-bug.content: If you encounter any bugs, something isn't working correctly, etc., you can go to our [feedback form](https://forms.gle/ceFMBMkvyUKwxpms7) and explain your issue.

suggestion.title: I have a suggestion!
suggestion.content: If you want to suggest a new feature, change something, or anything like that, you can go to our [feedback form](https://forms.gle/ceFMBMkvyUKwxpms7) and submit your suggestion.

fork-project.title: I want to contribute to the project, how can I do that?
fork-project.content: If you code and want to help, you can fork the [project's repository](http://github.com/feeeyli/multitwitch).

streams.no-streams:
It looks like you haven't selected any streams yet.

Click the "" button on the right and start watching!
